name: Frontier Runner
description: In Frontier Runner video game you play a character role in the mid-22nd century who was selected to travel on one of the first exploration ships that left earth to find new homes to expand mankind faiths, and ideologies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 2000 / XP / Vista Processor: 1.0 GHz Intel Pentium III equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: SB compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel I5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution. OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: SB compatible
